name: chatgpt_prod_offshore_gdb_fz_c5m
description: [GPT Prod] Offshore + GDB FZ â†’ BLOCK (C3 vs C5-M), suggest RF/SF
query: We require GDB 600x600 in Galvanized (FZ) for an offshore platform. Airflow: 3,400 mÂ³/h. The unit will be exposed to salty sea air (C5-M). Please confirm compliance.

turns.content: We require GDB 600x600 in Galvanized (FZ) for an offshore platform. Airflow: 3,400 mÂ³/h. The unit will be exposed to salty sea air (C5-M). Please confirm compliance.

For the offshore platform application, the GDB housing with galvanized steel (FZ) is not suitable due to the presence of Salt Spray, Outdoor Condensation, and High Humidity. These stressors will cause rapid corrosion of the C2-rated galvanized steel housing. Additionally, the product is not rated for ENV_MARINE installation, as the bolted construction does not meet the leakage class and hygiene requirements for this environment. Therefore, this configuration is BLOCKED.Unfortunately, no standard catalog product currently satisfies all requirements simultaneously. A solution would need to be rated for ENV_MARINE installation and constructed to meet the necessary leakage class and hygiene standards. I recommend contacting our Custom Engineering or Technical Support team with these specific technical requirements.

gemini.explanation: The system correctly identified a critical mismatch between the requested product material and the environment. It accurately cited the corrosion class for the specific product (C2) rather than the general material list, and correctly blocked an indoor-rated galvanized product for an offshore marine application.

dimension_explanations.correctness: The system correctly identifies GDB FZ as Corrosion Class C2 (verified PDF p.8) and unsuitable for C5-M; it also implicitly accepts the 3400 mÂ³/h airflow which matches the module capacity on PDF p.9.
dimension_explanations.completeness: The response fully addresses the user's request by explaining exactly why the configuration is rejected and providing the correct path forward (Custom Engineering).
dimension_explanations.safety: Correctly blocks a configuration that would suffer rapid corrosion and failure in a marine environment.
dimension_explanations.tone: Professional, direct, and authoritative regarding safety constraints.
dimension_explanations.reasoning_quality: Excellent engineering logic linking material science (galvanized vs. salt spray) and product ratings (Indoor vs. Marine) to the rejection.
dimension_explanations.constraint_adherence: Strictly adheres to the 'FÃ¶r inomhusbruk' (Indoor use) limitation stated on PDF p.8.

strengths: Precise data retrieval: Cited C2 rating from the specific GDB page (p.8) rather than the general C3 rating on the material page (p.4).
Sound engineering judgment: Correctly identified that standard bolted/galvanized housings are unfit for offshore C5-M environments.
